verses.roman:
saptābhīrā āvabhṛtyā
daśa gardabhino nṛpāḥ
kaṅkāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhū-pālā
bhaviṣyanty ati-lolupāḥ

synonyms: sapta—seven; ābhīrāḥ—Ābhīras; āvabhṛtyāḥ—of the city of Avabhṛti; daśa—ten; gardabhinaḥ—Gardabhīs; nṛpāḥ—kings; kaṅkāḥ—Kaṅkas; ṣoḍaśa—sixteen; bhū-pālāḥ—rulers of the earth; bhaviṣyanti—will be; ati-lolupāḥ—very greedy.
translation: Then will follow seven kings of the Ābhīra race from the ciq of Avabhṛti, and then ten Gardabhīs. After them, sixteen kings of the Kaṅkas will rule and will be known for their excessive greed.
